title: The 10 Best Perfume Discovery Sets Your Recipient Won’t Want to Return
description: One for their handbag, desk, and car!
excerpt: ELLE editors share the best perfume discovery sets for holiday gift-giving, from Kayali’s hypnotizing scents to Creed’s sophisticated notes.

The Viral Perfumes

Phlur Fragrance Discover Set in Beauty

Scrolling through the perfume side of TikTok guarantees a few stops at videos praising Phlur’s olfactory offerings. Whether your introduction to the brand was through Father Figure or Missing Person, or whether you’re a millennial or Gen-Z, there isn’t a scent in this set that won’t intrigue you. Not Your Baby elevates all the childish notes you detest in other baby-scented formulas to something more sophisticated, feminine, and bright; Solar Power is a sexy twist on what you’d expect sun-kissed skin to smell like.

Includes: Missing Person; Ameline; Not Your Baby; Lost Cause; Apricot Privee; Phloria; Somebody Wood; Tangerine Boy

Size: 8 vials, 0.067 fl oz/each

Revolve rating: 5/5 stars

A Revolve reviewer says: “I’m totally in love with these clean perfumes! They’re free from toxic and carcinogen ingredients. Highly recommend!”

Best Mood-Boosting Perfumes

Brown Girl Jane Discovery Set

At the heart of each Brown Girl Jane fragrance is the emotion it hopes to inspire in every wearer—think of them as your daily supplement in olfactory form. With this discovery set, a host of emotions are waiting to be unearthed, from Dawn’s energetic, booze-soaked vanilla aroma to Casablanca’s romantic warmth.

Includes: Casablanca; Bahia; Lamu; Dawn, Dusk, Dare

Size: 6 vials, 0.67 fl oz/each

Sephora rating:

A Sephora reviewer says: “I purchased the discovery set! When I tell you I’m in love with 5 out of 6 scent! Casablanca and Dare is my favorite! I purchased Casablanca on the BGJ website. I can’t wait to purchase Dare next!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Quiet Luxury Discovery Set

Creed 3-Piece Fragrance Discovery Set

Aventus is the first place people start when testing Creed fragrances, but there’s so much more to the brand than it’s cult-favorite bestseller. To immerse yourself in the brand’s bold yet delicate fragrances, you’ll need to venture to its other aromatic corners. For those who enjoy a flower’s darker side, spritz Carmina, a sexy woodsy base with black cherry sweetness. If you prefer your florals as bright and light as a spring day, Wind Flowers, a floral medley anchored by amber, will quickly become your collection’s star. Good thing Creed’s timeless and modern discovery set gives you all that and more.

Includes: Aventus for Her Eau de Parfum, Carmina Eau de Parfum, Wind Flower

Size: 3, 0.33 fl oz/each

Why we love it: “Quiet luxury fragrance fans know about Creed, the perfume house that was a favorite of Audrey Hepburn and Grace Kelly. For those who want to become better acquainted with this more than 200-year-old brand, they offer this discovery set which has some of their best hits. A clear standout is its most recent launch, Carmina, a gourmand scent containing notes of black cherry, the new “it” ingredient in perfume.”—Kathleen Hou, ELLE beauty director

Best for Beginners

Sephora Favorites Perfume Sampler Set

Anyone on the receiving end of a perfume gift knows the wave of anxiety that occurs moments before that first spritz—will it dispense a delightful aroma or something so rancid it will end up in the trash? The cheat code for perfume gift-giving is to buy this Sephora Favorites pouch. Not only does it come with a bunch of tiny samples of perfumes to experiment with, but it also has a voucher for a free full-sized version of whatever scent you adore to be redeemed online or in-store. The giftee can choose form popular brands like Gucci, Valentino, Phlur, Fenty and more.

Includes: Burberry Her Eau de Parfum; Carolina Herrera Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum; Charlotte Tilbury More Sex Eau de Parfum; Fenty Eau de Parfum; Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia Eau de Parfum; Jo Malone London English Pear & Freesia Cologne; Valentino Donna Born In Roma Eau de Parfum; Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb Eau de Parfum; Yves Saint Laurent Libre Eau de Parfum; Juliette Has a Gun Not A Perfume Eau de Parfum; Kayali Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar Eau de Parfum; Kilian Paris Princess Eau de Parfum; Maison Margiela ‘Replica’ Lazy Sunday Morning Eau de Toilette; Nest New York Balinese Coconut Perfume Oil; Phlur Missing Person Eau de Parfum; Prada Paradoxe Eau de Parfum; The 7 Virtues Vanilla Woods Eau de Parfum; Tom Ford Cafe Rose Eau de Parfum

Size: 0.04 fl oz, 0.05 fl oz, 0.057 fl oz, 0.06 fl oz

Sephora rating: 3.4/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “I’ve gotten a couple of these sample sets for my husband over time, and they’ve always been so much fun, so I finally decided to get one for myself. We had a great time smelling all of the scents included and ranking them from most liked to least liked. I felt like 4 of them were in the running for using the voucher on, and I liked and would wear at least half of them, so it was definitely worth the purchase in my opinion. My personal top 4 were Burberry, Gucci, Jo Malone, and YSL.”

Best Warm Perfumes

Henry Rose Fragrance Discovery Set

Henry Rose specializes in genderless fragrances with clean, gentle ingredients and notes that feel invigorating and uplifting. If your beau is prone to sneaking a few spritzes of your favorite scent, here’s a sampling of the brand’s popular perfumes, like Windows Down or Queens & Monsters, that you can both enjoy fuss-free.

Includes: Char Eau de Parfum; Flora Carnivora Eau de Parfum; Jake's House Eau de Parfum; Queens & Monsters Eau de Parfum; Torn Eau de Parfum; Windows Down Eau de Parfum

Size: 0.05 oz. each

Nordstrom rating: 3.9/5 stars

A Henry Rose reviewer says: “These scents smell SO good! They last all day, and I keep getting compliments about how good I smell. I wish I found these sooner.”

Best Cold-Weather Scents

Jo Malone London Holiday Cologne Collection

No need to have holiday travel FOMO when Jo Malone’s festive-themed discovery perfume set can transport you to a snowy cabin (White Moss & Snowdrop Cologne), a sugary bakery (Ginger Biscuit Cologne), and everywhere in between.

Includes: Midnight Musk & Amber Cologne, White Moss & Snowdrop Cologne, Fir & Artemisia Cologne, Ginger Biscuit Cologne, Orange Bitters Cologne

Size: 5, 0.3 fl oz/each

Nordstrom rating: 4.5/5 stars

Why we love it: “Maybe you heard a rumor once that JLo’s tour rider included specific bath oils from Jo Malone. And maybe you want to know what JLo could smell like. In that case, this sampling of hits from the brand can give you an idea. I’m not JLo, but my personal favorite is their Wood Sage & Sea Salt, which reminds me of cold ocean winds and being wrapped up by the sea in a cozy sweater.”—Kathleen Hou, ELLE beauty director

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best for Vacation

Kayali Vacation in a Bottle Mini Perfume Set

I’ve never been to the Maldives, but if it smells anything like Kayali’s olfactory interpretation, then sign me up. The bright packaging complements the equally colorful and alluring notes in each bottle. Marrakech in a Bottle takes cues from the city of spices’ warm palette to create a scent built around orange blossom; Maui in a Bottle is a fruity delight reminiscent of the Hawaiian country.

Includes: Marrakesh in a Bottle Orange Blossom | 24, Capri in a Bottle Lemon Sugar | 14, Maui in a Bottle Sweet Banana | 37, Maldives in a Bottle Ylang Coco | 20

Size: 4, 0.33 fl oz

Sephora rating: 3.8/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “It is literally a vacation in a bottle, each scent takes you either to your favorite tropical place or to your happy memories. All very cheerful scents, sure to lift your mood. Use after applying lotion so it stays on you longer.”

Best Fresh and Fruity Perfume Set

Byredo La Selection Nomad Gift Set

Byredo has a legion of fans for every scent it offers, but this trio is perhaps the brand’s underrated trio. Each perfume in the set represents the versatility of the fragrance house. Bal D’Afrique is deep and fruity; Blanche is as fresh and clean as the color it’s named after, and Gypsy Water is a citrus-spicy blend.

Includes: Bal D’Afrique, Blanche, Gypsy Water

Size: 3, 0.4 fl oz/each

Nordstrom rating: 4.1/5 stars

Why we love it: “Gypsy Water and Blanche are two of my top fragrances of all time. I love Gypsy Water so much that I keep one on my desk at the office to reapply before attending events and dinners after work and one at home. Meanwhile, I’ve gone through half a bottle of Blanche this year alone—which makes sense since I always want to smell like clean laundry. I also like to layer Blanche with all of my fragrances since it sits so close to the skin and adds such a fresh vibe. Even though I already have two of the fragrances in this set, I’m tempted to pick it up myself for travel. Plus, I’ve been dying to try Bal D'Afrique since Nerisha raves about it so much.”—Carol Lee, ELLE.com associate beauty commerce writer

Best for Day and Night

Le Labo Travel Tube Fragrance Discovery Set

While Santal 33 needs no introduction, Another 13 and Thé Noir are other Le Labo favorites deserving of the spotlight. Santal 33’s woody notes are a departure from Another 13, a calming yet deep bed of floral and amber notes. Thé Noir 29 is even deeper than Santal 33 and swells with black tea leaf and spices.

Includes: Another 13, Santal 33, Thé Noir 29

Size: 3, 0.33 fl oz

Nordstrom rating: 4.2/5 stars

Why we love it: “In the realm of perfume, even Le Labo sample sizes are pricey (typically, over $100 for .5 ounces). That makes this set of three Le Labo samples a pretty good deal to try iconic scents like Santal 33 and Another 13. These fragrances are well-known for a reason—they’re practically compliment magnets, and they make you smell luxe.”—Katie Berohn, ELLE beauty editor

Best Perfume Icons Set

Macy’s Fragrance Sampler Set for Her

Now 50% Off

You’ve likely sniffed (or were forced to sniff) one of these scents while perusing your local Macy’s. With this set, chock-full of classic icons like Lancôme La Vie est Belle or Marc Jacobs perfect, you can sample them all to see which one pairs well with your body chemistry enough to purchase a full-sized version.

Includes: Christian Siriano Ooh La Rouge Exclusif Eau de Parfum; Dolce & Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum, Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau de Toilette; Donna Karan Cashmere Mist Eau de Parfum,
Givenchy Irresistible Eau de Parfum, Jimmy Choo I Want Choo Le Parfum, Juicy Couture Viva La Juicy Eau de Parfum, Lancôme Idôle Le Parfum, Lancôme La vie est belle Eau de Parfum, MARC JACOBS Perfect Eau de Parfum, Moschino Toy 2 Pearl Eau de Parfum, Mugler ANGEL Eau de Parfum, Prada Candy Eau de Parfum, Ralph Lauren Romance Eau de Parfum, Tous LoveMe The Onyx Parfum, Valentino Voce Viva Eau de Parfum, Versace Bright Crystal Eau de Toilette, Yves Saint Laurent Libre Eau de Toilette

Size: 0.03 to 0.06 fl oz

Macy’s rating: 4.5/5 stars

A Macy’s reviewer says: “It’s an excellent way to sample perfume and figure out what you like the most. You also get so much perfume. It takes a while to finish all of them.”
